titleStmt.title: The Greek Bible text of the Nestle-Aland, Novum Testamentum Graece, 28th revised edition, © 2012 Deutsche Bibelgesellschaft, Stuttgart.
The New Testament
The epistle to the Galatians
Galatians

sourceDesc.p: The base text created for the ECM of Galatians by Hugh Houghton. This is the NA28 text but may be edited if required for the collation.
